messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Egg No-Moon Six. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Egg No-Moon Six have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: EVACUATE TO SHUTTLE: SUPERMATTER ENGINE OVERLOADED
